item.title: The perfect pull request
item.description: I spend most of my day reviewing pull requests in Github. These are my working notes on what makes a good PR. Explain why you did what you did It should be clear to the reviewer what change is being made and, crucially, why. So choose a good PR title and use the description to detail the motivation for a change. Consider including: Screenshots, such as snaps of a new UI or graphs of the devastating performance improvement your PR delivers.
